moves.title: Other
changes: Trip getup and back roll now match the rest of the cast, SFX errors fixed
Crouch entry frames normalized (10 > 8), allows dashback out of crouch earlier

moves.title: Other
changes: Crouch entry frames normalized (16 > 8), allows dashback out of crouch earlier

moves.title: Up Tilt
changes: Up-tilt startup 26 > 25 (now matches 3.6)
Linking hitbox restored and links properly

moves.title: Up Special (Belay)
changes: Fixed issue which made Up Special break tethers

moves.title: Side Special (Quick Draw)
changes: Can now wall jump out of Quick Draw with a jump input

moves.title: Neutral Special (Solar Beam)
changes: Solar Beam hitboxes now properly line up with GFX

moves.title: Neutral Special (Inhale)
changes: Diddy Kong hat no longer loses momentum on peanut shoot
Ganondorf hat frame data now matches Ganondorf’s
Mewtwo hat Shadow Balls now explode when they hit walls
Pit hat behavior now matches Pit behavior
Squirtle hat now matches Squirtle’s Water Gun
Can now be grabbed while charging Sheik needles

moves.title: Jab
changes: Jab 1 knockback growth 55 > 80

moves.title: Neutral Air
changes: Sweetspot outer nair hitbox size 4.5 > 4.2, sourspot 4.0 > 3.8

moves.title: Dash Attack
changes: IASA 52 > 46

moves.title: Down Throw
changes: Knockback growth 30 > 38
Punch hits now have 10 BKB to hit surrounding characters

moves.title: Down Special (Spin Dash)
changes: Base knockback 81 > 42, Knockback growth 40 > 78
Startup 12 > 18

moves.title: Other
changes: Hurtboxes adjusted to better match model
Sphere hurtbox on Neutral Special uppercut removed
Win3 animation revamped

moves.title: Down Air
changes: Down air offset fixed to be able to be L-cancelled during hitlag and to no longer crash on console

moves.title: Other
changes: Hurtboxes reverted to Brawl, as they were shown to be more accurate via new developments

moves.title: Up Special
changes: Boosts now have proper 3.6 properties

moves.title: Other
changes: Hurtbox adjusted to better match model

moves.title: Neutral Special
changes: Animation on release cleaned up

moves.title: Up Smash
changes: Angling up smash while one is already out will now work

moves.title: Side Special (Shoulder Bash)
changes: Aerial version recieved an updated animation to match the grounded version

moves.title: Down Special (Shine)
changes: Air to ground transition fixed

moves.title: Bowser’s Castle
changes: Legal and Thwomp versions optimized for better FPS on console

moves.title: Delfino’s Secret
changes: Platform collision width now matches 3.6
Platform width matches collision
Layout changes every 30 seconds instead of every 23 seconds
Cleaned up animations and fixed Shine Sprite rotating animation

moves.title: Dream Land
changes: Water background animation now loops properly on all alts

moves.title: Final Destination
changes: Z-alt: Removed Legacy logo

moves.title: Frigate Orpheon
changes: R-alt: lighting and fog improvement, file size reduced

moves.title: Golden Temple
changes: Lighting changed to match R-alt, corner bricks better match collisions
R-alt: corners received UV fixes

moves.title: Lylat Cruise
changes: R-alt: visual issues with lights fixed

moves.title: Metal Cavern
changes: R-alt: added pipe on left side, fixed lighting to match stage, added character shadows to platform

moves.title: Peach’s Castle
changes: Stage optimized for better FPS on console

moves.title: Sky Sanctuary Zone
changes: L-alt: Lighting issues on crates and shadows fixed

moves.title: Smashville
changes: Midnight verison upper blastzone 180 > 195 (normalized with other versions)

moves.title: Training Room
changes: Z-alt: Legacy logo removed

moves.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Trip Armour code adjusted to prevent issues with non-hitstun moves
Faux Super Armour (most instances of Port Priority) removed
Characters can now down air through moving platforms without being caught
Landing on the very edge of collisions no longer causes weirdness
Interpolation cast-wide fixed to function properly
Normalized knockdown getup attacks on Peach, Jigglypuff, Samus, and Zelda
Normalized ledge getup attacks on Kirby, Knuckles, Mewtwo, Ness, Olimar, Roy, and Zero Suit Samus
Momentum issues with DK up smash fixed
Iron Tail GFX fixed on Go Hat, Lightbulb, and R-Alt Pikachu costumes
Peach double jump now works properly with Screw Attack
Fixed visibility issues on the Charmy semi-alt for Knuckles
Samus jet GFX fixed
Giga Bowser and Wario-Man can now properly complete Classic and All-Star modes

moves.title: Stages/Music
changes: Spikes in Stage Builder stages no longer crash the game when touched
PM FD spawn points normalized

moves.title: Other
changes: Netplay launcher now uses proper hooktype, decreasing input lag
Screen KOs and game endings no longer zoom in the camera
BOSS mode can now be activated on any port

moves.title: Characters/Costumes
changes: Clone Engine characters now have unique All-Star end screens

moves.title: Stages
changes: Many stages optimized for file size
Stage banner errors on Dracula’s Castle and Wario Land fixed
See-Saw moved from Final Destination to Pictochat

moves.title: Other
changes: THP replacement engine code added
Random stage select now has larger stage previews
Strap and Results screen updated for version 2.15
